data.text: Mii Paolo, karumiya a Yesu Kuristo, kiihaniye ni Nlhuku ukhalha namitheko ni ukithanlha wiira kaahimiachere attu Malhove Orera, kinoowiiha iwarakha uwaninyu.
Khalhayi vawo Nlhuku ahaalheelha attu Malhove Orera alha wo iphiro ya anamilhohi, thoko chaalhehiye aya ni Malhove Matakatifu.
Malhove Orera alha anomwaacha Mwaana a Nlhuku, Athithi Yesu Kuristo, ayarelhe wo iruttu mwi iyari ya Adaudi,
aapangiye ukhalha Mwaana a Nlhuku wo uhimiecheshiya ni Iphumu itakatifu ya Nlhuku, wo machiri molhupalhe wo uhihimushiya nnookhwani, Yesu Kuristo Athithi.
Wo nlhatu no nchina nawe, Nlhuku hokivaha nnema ni ikuru yo ukhalha karumiya wo nlhatu wo waahimeria attu o makosho onkhaye wiira arumelhelhe ni upisha nrima.
Ni inyu mwaatti nri Uroma va, Nlhuku hoothanlhani ukhalha attu a Yesu Kuristo.
Paahi etu kinolhepa uwaninyu mwaatti onkhaye atakatifu anottuniya ni Nlhuku nri Uroma va, mwiihaniye ukhalha attu awe.
Wo uchokholha, kinonshukuru Nlhuku aka wo iphiro ya Yesu Kuristo wo nlhatu winyu mwaatti onkhaye. Ukhalhawaya mwaha wo upisha nrima winyu uheewania ilhapo yonkhaye.
Nlhuku kinonkaviha aka wo nrima waka wonkhaye uhimiechesha Malhove Orera o Mwaamwanawe, hoona chineera aka wo ulhapelhelhani kila ikatema.
Mahuku onkhaye vanolhapelha aka, kinonlhapelha Nlhuku wiira wo uttuna wawe akivahe nipesha no uwa ushikuriani mwaatti.
Ukhalhawaya kiri kithananaka uwoonani mwaatti, kiwe kookawelhani ibarakha cho munnepani chikivanhe awe Iphumu ya Nlhuku wiira kuulhipiheni munrimani.
Ittu kinohimiaka vaa phi ilha, mwaatti ni mii nikavihaneke naashineneru ni upishihana nrima.

Ashilhoko aka, nchuwelheke etu wiira wo ikatema chinchi kiholhakelha wiira kuweetelhelheni, nansho mpaka vano nna kihochiichihiya kihiire chiicho. Kinothanana attu o munlhokoni mwinyu anthimiche Nlhuku thoko chinre aya attu akina ahiri Ayahudi.
Ukhalhawaya kihanaa ntheko wo weettuchiha attu onkhaye, Ayunani ni ahiri Ayunani, ni waahimiachera Malhove Orera attu o ushoma ni attu o uhishoma.
Paahi etu phi nothanana aka uhimeriani Malhove Orera mwaatti nnokhalha Uroma va.
Akoonelhaka ishoni Malhove Orera ukhalhawaya machiri o Nlhuku phi noopolha attu onkhaye anorumelhelha, achokholhaka Ayahudi ni kaanyuma Ayunani!

Ukhalhawaya Malhove Orera ahopatakulha Nlhuku chinaaratiha awe attu ukhalha o ikekhia. Ittu inokhalha wo nrima, uchokholha mpaka umalha waya. Thoko Malhove Matakatifu chineera aya, “Ntu nopanga moombone mmiholho wa Nlhuku, nookhalha nkumi wo nrima wawe.”
Nlhuku hopatakulha urushiya wawe wiirimu waaphiyelhe attu anonnyoholha Nlhuku ni uwonya wo upanga chittu cho uhilhoka ni ukhota wiira ikeekhene ihichuwanie.
Ukhalhawaya chittu chinomwaacha Nlhuku chiri mwaari. Nlhuku mwanene phi pannge ukhalha mwaari.

Toka Nlhuku voopilhe awe ilhapo urata ni wooria wawe wo uhimalha wahochuwaniaa, inakhalhaka khawoonelhe wo miitho, attu ahoona wo chittu chonkhaye chuupilhe awe, yaani wooria wawe. Paahi etu attu kharina iphiro tho yo wiichaakiha!
Attu ahochuwelha wiira Nlhuku hawo, nansho khanommaha nthimicho unomphwanelha mena khanonshukuru. Nansho irusho chaya chihooma ni mirima chaya chihalhaka mwiipiphini.
Aneechona ukhalha o irusho, nansho ahophupuwalhacha,
ahohiya unthimicha Nlhuku ri nkumi, ni uthimicha isinyago chinoonia thoko ntu nkumi ama ashinuni ama ashinama o mieto micheshe ama anaakooko.
Paahi etu Nlhuku haahiya atware mirima chaya cho uwonya ni upanga chittu cho unanara cho mwiiruttuni mwaya.
Ahorukunushacha ikeekhene ya Nlhuku wo woothacha, ni uthimicha ni ukaviha chittu chuupiye ni Nlhuku, wo uhinthimicha Nrata nophwanelhiya utotopelhiya mahuku o uhimalha! Aye!
Ukhalhawaya ahopanga yayo, Nlhuku haahiya atwaretwareke nikakata naya no uhilhoka. Ata manyopani ahohiya urupa ni manyaalhopwana thoko chuupiye aya ni upangacha chittu chihinophwanelhiya.

Ni manyaalhopwana chiicho, ahohiya iphiro chuupiye upangiya nlhopwana ni nthiyana, akelhiyaka ikhwilhu ni uthelhanacha ashineneru. Manyaalhopwana ampangelhana chittu cho wuulhiha muru ashineneru. Paahi etu ahophwanelhiya upochera ntwarusho no iphiro chinowonya aya.
Ukhalhawaya alha attu alha ahokhota ukhalha ni Nlhuku mwiirushoni mwaya, ni uyo etu haahiya mu uwonyani mwaya. Phi nlhatu vano no upangacha chittu chihimphwanelhiya aya upanga.
Yayo attu ayo ahocharacha milhatu chonkhaye cho uwonya, uthurulha chittu cha attu, nlhulha ni uhilhokalhoka. Ahochara ihache, niiviho, indewo, woothacha ni nrima wo unanara. Anowaapa,
ni uhimiacha chittu cho uhilhoka cha akhunanaya ni uhinttuna Nlhuku. Attu o tiyamaru ni nikakata anoopuwelhacha chittu cho uhilhoka ni mena khanaalhoha manyanaangoro aayanre.
Kharina nrima woombone, khanokhulhuvelhiya, khanolhoka mena khanoonelha ikiriri ashikhunanaya.

Ahochuwelhacha wiira ikekhiaye ya Nlhuku ahaamuka attu anottwara iphiro cho yayo manyaattu ayo wiira ahophwanelhiya ukhwa. Inakhalhaka chiicho etu, arii athepaka upanga chittu cho unanara ashineneru, ata ni waavaha nrima attu aneera chiicho.
